sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Card, Container, Row, Col, Button } from "react-bootstrap" const Workout = ({workout}) => { const handleSignUp = (name) => { console.log(`signed up for ${name} class`); } return ( {workout.description} On {`${workout.date.substring(8,10)}.${workout.date.substring(5,7)}, ${workout.date.substring(11,16)} `} {`Price: ${workout.revenuePerClient} shekels`} Duration: { workout.duration > 1 ? `${workout.duration} hours` : `${workout.duration} hour` } { Number(workout.maxClients - workout.currentClients) === 0 ? 'Sold Out' : Number(workout.maxClients - workout.currentClients) === 1 ? '1 Place left!' : `${Number(workout.maxClients - workout.currentClients)} Places Left`} ) } export default Workout
